title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Archive
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases     Archive                Archive           Subscribe  | What is RSS     June 16, 2016  Independence Day Celebration & Ice Cream Social  Join us for an Independence Day celebration, complete with ice cream and music too!   March 04, 2016  2016 MLB Opening Day Parade  Opening Day festivities with the Friends of William Howard Taft NHS and additional park partners and friends.   March 04, 2016  Annual Easter Egg Hunt  The park's annual Easter Egg Hunt will be held on Sunday, March 20th at the Taft House and Taft Education Center.   February 25, 2016  Park selects new Chief of Interpretation, Education & Operation  William Howard Taft National Historic Site selects new Chief of Interpretation, Education, and Operations.   February 01, 2016  President's Day at the Park 2016  Celebrate 2016 President's Day at the national park which pays honor to the nation's 27th President and the nation's 10th Chief Justice of the Supreme Court.  Activities for all ages.   November 05, 2015  Victorian Christmas Celebration  William Howard Taft National Historic Site located in the Mount Auburn neighborhood will celebrate a Victorian Christmas with free events and daily tours throughout the holiday season.   October 14, 2015  Taft Symposium: A Life of Public Service  Join us at the park for an intimate meeting where we will discuss the public service life of the nation's 27th President.   September 11, 2015  Hallows Eve 2015  Get ready to experience an unearthly holiday celebration. A Victorian-era Halloween awaits you at Cincinnati's national park.   August 18, 2015  Find Your Park and Celebrate the NPS at 99  The National Park Service is turning 99 and you're invited to help us celebrate!  Join us on August 25th, Founders Day, as we celebrate this milestone and as we host the last Summer Tea Session at the park for this year.   August 17, 2015  2014 Economic Benefits Report  William Howard Taft NHS reports the economic benefit and impact the park has had on the city of Cincinnati in 2014.   June 19, 2015  Summer Afternoon Tea Sessions  Join us as special guest speakers honor the Taft family contributions to Cincinnati.   June 09, 2015  2015 Ice Cream Social  Join us for the park's annual Ice Cream social celebrating the 4th of July!  This even is free to the public.  Live musical entertainment will be provided too!   March 05, 2015  2015 Easter Egg Hunt  Annual Easter Egg Hunt at Cincinnati's National Park.   February 05, 2015  Celebrate Presidents Day at Cincinnati's National Park  Celebrate Presidents Day 2015 by visiting Cincinnati's national park on February 16th for tours, activities and prizes for all ages.   February 05, 2015  Ranger Guided Tours of Historic Mount Auburn  Enjoy a ranger-guided tour of the historic Mount Auburn area, on Sunday's in May. This 90 minute tour will explore the the "Personalities & Architecture of Mount Auburn."   December 02, 2014  Traditional New Year's Open House  Visit Cincinnati's national park site on January 4th for a traditional open house.   December 02, 2014  Father Christmas Visits the Presidential Home  Get ready for Santa! Father Christmas will be visiting the site to meet and greet kids of all ages.   December 02, 2014  Candlelight Tours of Taft House  Celebrate the holidays with William Howard Taft NHS as we offer candlelight tours of the Taft birthplace home.   September 10, 2014  Halloween Open House  William Howard Taft National Historic Site will celebrate a Halloween Open House with free events. The house where William Howard Taft was born and grew up will be decorated to reflect the mid-Victorian period during the Halloween Celebration on October 25, 2014.   June 12, 2014  Free Concert and Ice Cream Social  William Howard Taft National Historic Site will host an Ice Cream Social with music by Ma Crow and the Lady Slippers. The annual social will be held on the grounds of the birthplace and boyhood home of the nation's 27th President and 10th Chief Justice.
